mapper.insert: insert into scores( address, played_date, score ) values ( #{address}, sysdate, #{score} )
mapper.select:
select * from( select rownum "RN", name, address, score from ( select u.name "NAME", u.address "ADDRESS", max(s.score) "SCORE" from scores s join users u on s.address = u.address where 1=1 and to_char(played_date) = to_char(sysdate) and 210000 > to_number(to_char(played_date, 'hh24miss')) group by u.name, u.address order by 3 desc ) )
where rn between #{high} and #{low}
